attributes.action: do not ban halal slaughter houses
attributes.additional_details: do not ban halal slaughter houses in the uk why? because usual slaughter houses stun their animals and cruelly cut them apart while their still alive! halal slaughter houses ensure the animals do not feel pain so it passes out with one cut. another point to make halal do not put animals to suffering they are fed and watered. unlike usual slaughter houses who dont care if the animal is starving or thirsty.
